<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_data_source</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_data_source">mid_serverISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="mid_server" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Invalid selected MID error msg</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if (current.mid_server.validated == 'false') gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Selected MID server has not been validated and may not function as a data source"));
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>will.swift</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-08-19 21:26:38</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0eee74e0370202000e4d03488e41f179</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Invalid selected MID error msg</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="System Import Sets" source="com.glide.system_import_set">cc63fca03c31311068bcf327dfe37f48</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0eee74e0370202000e4d03488e41f179</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>will.swift</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-08-19 21:28:49</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0eee74e0370202000e4d03488e41f179"/> </record_update>
